name: Chicken Slide
description:
Chickens with skiis racing to see who is better. Chickens trying to collect things with skiis. Chickens taking turbo burst to go way faster than they should. What I mean is this is a game about chickens with skiis, and that is all that matters.

I made this game for a task for class. They made me choose two random topics, and the make a game about it. I chose chicken and ski, and I ended up doing this.

I may or may not have used Stardew Valley's chicken sprite as inspiration for my chicken sprite. I'm really bad at making sprites.

Music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/BoxCat_Games/Nameless_the_Hackers_RPG_Soundtra...

Font: https://www.dafont.com/es/vcr-osd-mono.font

The rest of the assest are made by me.
